name: Music_4152.wav
keywords: ['soap opera theme', 'acoustic guitar', 'clarinet', 'bass guitar', 'melodic pad', 'electronic drums', 'chimes', 'sentimental', 'emotional']
caption: This is a soap opera theme music. There is a clarinet playing the main tune with the acoustic guitar and the bass guitar in the backing. There is a melodic pad that can be heard. An acoustic sounding electronic cymbal and wind chimes strokes are playing every now and then. There is a sentimental atmosphere to this piece.
